titles.title: Extension of Vital Tax Policy Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for State and local sales taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
9/27/2007--Introduced.
Extension of Vital Tax Policy Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2008 the taxpayer election to deduct state and local sales taxes in lieu of state and local income taxes.
